io.spine.server.delivery

Class ShardProcessingSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.delivery.ShardProcessingSession

  • @SPI
public abstract class ShardProcessingSession
extends java.lang.Object
    The session of processing the messages, which reside in a shard.

    Starts by ShardedWorkRegistry.pickUp(ShardIndex, NodeId) picking up} the shard to process.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ShardProcessingSession(io.spine.server.delivery.ShardSessionRecord record) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract void complete()
      Completes this session and releases the picked shard, making it available for picking up.
      io.spine.server.delivery.ShardIndex shardIndex()
      Returns the index of the shard, to which this session relates to.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
